治疗生命值低于50%的友方单位时治疗量提升<@ba.kw>15%</>.en: When healing allied units with less than 50% HP, increases heal amount by <@ba.kw>15%</>

治疗地面单位时治疗量提升<@ba.kw>15%</>.en: Healing increased by <@ba.kw>15%</> when healing a ground unit

攻击空中单位时攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>.en: Increases ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking aerial targets

范围内存在地面敌人时攻击速度<@ba.kw>+8</>.en: When there are ground enemies within range, ASPD <@ba.kw>+8</>

攻击被阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</>.en: Increases ATK to <@ba.kw>{atk_scale:0%}</> when attacking blocked enemies

攻击正前方的敌人时攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>105%</>且无视其物理闪避.en: Increases ATK to <@ba.kw>105%</> when attacking enemies directly in front, and ignores their Physical Dodge

攻击重量较重（重量等级大于等于3）的敌人时，攻击力提升至<@ba.kw>115%.en: When attacking a heavy enemy (weight 3 or greater), ATK increased to <@ba.kw>115%</>

再部署时间<@ba.kw>减少</>，撤退时不返还<@ba.kw>部署费用</>.en: Has <@ba.kw>reduced</> Redeployment Time, but <@ba.kw>DP Cost</> is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, <@ba.kw>2 DP</> are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)

拖拽期间敌人受到正比于距离的法术伤害.en: While being pulled, enemies take <@ba.kw>Arts damage</> proportional to the distance traveled

攻击范围内所有敌人移动速度<@ba.kw>-20%</>.en: Slows the Movement Speed of enemies within this unit's attack range by <@ba.kw>20%</>

对攻击范围内<@ba.kw>所有敌人</>造成伤害\\n拥有65%的物理和法术闪.en:
Deals Damage to <@ba.kw>all targets within range
65% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be <@ba.kw>targeted by enemies

攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>，并对敌人造成<@ba.kw>较长</>的.en: Attacks deal <@ba.kw>Arts damage</>, and <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> the enemy for a <@ba.kw>moderate</> period of time

能够阻挡两个敌人，阻挡敌人时攻击力和防御力各+8％.en: Blocks 2 enemies; Gains +8% ATK and DEF while blocking enemies

造成法术伤害时附带相当于<@ba.vup>8%</>伤害的<$ba.dt.apo.en: When Deals <@ba.kw>Arts damage</> , Inflict <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Apoptosis</> damage by <@ba.vup>8%</> of damage dealt

受到来自自身阻挡单位的伤害降低<@ba.kw>15%</>.en: <@ba.kw>Cannot</> be healed by allies, Reduces damage taken by blocked enemies by <@ba.kw>15%</>

持有<@ba.kw>回旋投射物</>时才能够攻击（投射物需要时间回收）.en: Only attack when has <@ba.kw>Throwing Projectile</> (Projectile take time to return)

parts.type_cn: 攻击造成法术伤害
parts.type_jp: 敵に術ダメーゾを与える

parts.type_cn: 同时攻击阻挡的所有敌人
parts.type_en: Attack multiple enemies equal to block count
parts.type_jp: ブロツク中の敵全員を同時に攻撃

parts.type_cn: 攻击造成群体物理伤害
攻击造成超远距离的群体法术伤害
parts.type_en: Super Long Range Splash Spell Damage

parts.type_cn: 可以进行远程攻击
可以攻击到较远敌人
攻击造成群体法术伤害
再部署时间大幅度减少
技能可以使敌人产生位移
对攻击范围内所有敌人造成伤害
优先攻击攻击范围内防御力最低的敌方单位
优先攻击重量最重的敌人
持续恢复攻击范围内所有友军的生命（每秒恢复相当于空攻击力10%的生命）
parts.type_en: Heal all allies in range </br>(Equal to 10% of attack power every second)

parts.type_cn: 且不受部署数量限制
无法被友方角色治疗
parts.type_en: Cannot be healed by friendly unit

parts.type_cn: 可以使用召唤物协助作战
并对敌人造成短暂的停顿
拥有50%的物理和法术闪避且不容易成为敌人的攻击目标
parts.type_en: 50% Physical & Magical Dodge</br>Harder to be targeted

parts.type_cn: 优先攻击空中单位
能够阻挡三个敌人
parts.type_jp: 敵を3体敵をまでブロツク

parts.type_cn: 能够阻挡两个敌人
parts.type_jp: 敵を2体敵をまでブロツク

parts.type_cn: 能够阻挡一个敌人
parts.type_jp: 敵を1体敵をまでブロツク

parts.type_cn: 恢复友方单位生命
同时恢复三个友方单位的生命
parts.type_en: Heal up to 3 friendly unit at once

parts.type_cn: 技能可以治疗友方单位
高精度的近距离射击
击杀敌人后获得1点部署费用
撤退时返还初始部署费用
可以放置于远程位
parts.type_en: Can be placed on higher ground

parts.type_cn: 不进行攻击
但此时攻击力降低至80%
parts.type_en: However attack power will be reduced to 80%

parts.type_cn: 但再部署时间极长
普通攻击连续造成两次伤害
不成为其他角色的治疗目标
parts.type_en: Cannot be healed by other operators

parts.type_cn: 每次攻击到敌人后回复自身{value}生命
parts.type_en: Heal {value} on every hit on enemies

parts.type_cn: 拥有较大治疗范围
但在治疗较远目标时治疗量变为{heal_scale:0%}
parts.type_en:
However attack power will be reduced to {heal_scale:0%}
when healing distant target

parts.type_cn: 技能发动期间阻挡数变为0
parts.type_en: Reduce block count to 0 when using skills

parts.type_cn: 技能开启时普通攻击会造成法术伤害
parts.type_en: Attack cause spell damage on skill

parts.type_cn: 攻击范围内的所有敌人
对自己前方一横排的敌人攻击力提升至150%
parts.type_en: Deal 150% damage to enemies a row ahead

parts.type_cn: 自身生命会不断流失
parts.type_en: Self HP will decreases over time

parts.type_cn: 被友方角色治疗无法
且会在3个敌人间跳跃
parts.type_en: Attacks bounce between up to 3 times

parts.type_cn: 每次跳跃伤害降低25%并造成短暂停顿
parts.type_en: Reduce damage by 25% each time and inflicting slow for 0.2 seconds

parts.type_cn: 操作浮游单元对敌人造成法术伤害
parts.type_en: Controls a Float Unit that deals magic damage

parts.type_cn: 浮游单元连续攻击同一敌人时伤害提升（最高造成干员110%攻击力的伤害）
parts.type_en: Float Unit damage up when attacking the same enemy (Up to 110% of the operator's Attack)

parts.type_cn: 通常时不攻击且防御力和法术抗性大幅度提升
parts.type_en: Does not attack normally, massively increased defense & magic res when not attacking

parts.type_cn: 技能开启时攻击造成群体法术伤害
parts.type_en: Deal spell damage on all enemy in range while skill is active

parts.type_cn: 再部署时间减少
撤退时不返还部署费用
在场时每3秒消耗3点部署费用（不足时自动撤退）
parts.type_en: Uses 3 cost on every 3 second (automatically retreat when insufficient cost)

parts.type_cn: 只有阻挡敌人时才能够回复技力
parts.type_en: Can only gain SP when blocking

parts.type_cn: 攻击对小范围的地面敌人造成两次物理伤害（第二次为余震
parts.type_en: Attacks deal physical splash damage twice to ground enemies in a small area

parts.type_cn: 伤害降低至攻击力的一半）
parts.type_en: (2nd hit is an aftershock with 50% Attack)

parts.type_cn: 每次跳跃伤害降低15%并造成短暂停顿
parts.type_en: Each chain cause small pause and -15% damage

parts.type_cn: 攻击自身未阻挡的敌人时攻击力提升至120%
parts.type_en: Damage Increased to 120% when attacking enemies not blocked by self
